name: Double Points
description: Doubles point values received during use.

name: Insta-Kill
description: Enables players to instantly kill zombies with a single hit from any weapon.

name: Max Ammo
description: Gives the weapons of all players full reserve ammo, including grenades.

name: Nuke
description: Kills all zombies on the map at the time of detonation and gives 400 points to every player.

name: Carpenter
description: Boards up all windows and gives all players 200 points.

name: Fire Sale
description: Lowers the price of the Mystery Box from 950 to 10 points for 20 seconds, while making it spawn at every possible location on the map.

name: Death Machine
description: Gives the user, for 30 seconds, a Death Machine, a rapid-fire minigun with infinite ammo

name: Random Perk Bottle
description: Grants all non-downed players a free, random Perk-a-Cola, even pass the default four perk limit.

name: Bonus Points
description: Awards a random amount of points, either to player or all players.

name: Bonfire Sale
description: Links all teleporters to the Pack-a-Punch machine and lowers the price of Pack-a-Punching from 5000 to 1000 points and Double Pack-a-Punching to from 2500 to 500 points.
